name: Trunda Giltmallet
aura: Increases Magic Ally ATK in All Battles by 36%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn after the second hit.
skills.name: Golden Mallet
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy, then attacks all other enemies with a second hit, dealing 60% of the damage inflicted from the first hit.
skills.name: Cloak of Ages
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 70% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Places a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns on enemies under [Stun] debuffs. Places an extra hit on enemies not under [Stun] debuffs.
skills.name: Forge Rhythm
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%

skills.desc:
This Champion’s RES increases by 10 for each [Stun] debuff this Champion places on enemies. Stacks across each round in a battle, up to 100. 

This Champion’s SPD increases by 5 for each enemy currently under a [HP Burn] debuff. Only counts active [HP Burn] debuffs. Stacks up to 15.
skills.name: Swift Justice [P]
